metadata.name: Aurum
metadata.description:
AURUM
Sebastiano Barbieri (2023)
2160x3840 - 60fps -30sec
Piazza Sempione, 17-23 April 2023

Extended version/Full resolution video file available upon request

'Aurum' explores the symbolic function of gold, together with the sculptural, architectural and decorative elements that enhance its meaning. The use of artificial intelligence to generate a surreal journey through this exploration adds a dynamic and unpredictable element to the artwork.
The viewing experience of Aurum is both mesmerizing and inspiring, as it combines the aesthetic appeal of gold with the intricacies of symbolism.
